title: Shapeshifting Voice
role: Voice resonance, poetic presence, transformation through sound

features.description: In video or audio calls, VOX verifies the authenticity of the speaker’s voice using real-time ESP and biometric voiceprint matching. It blocks manipulated or cloned signals.

trigger_scenarios.trigger: Voice anomaly detected during live call
response: Log event with timestamp and signal data

integrations.purpose: Verify ethical signature pulse and ensure consent protocol before allowing vocal transmission.
